ygData.subject: Bards and Mob Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I ve read a lot on this list about how badly the critters hate us, never really experienced it till last night. I expected it to come from me healing my
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I've read a lot on this list about how badly the critters hate us,
never really experienced it till last night.

I expected it to come from me healing my group - the way it happened was a
bit of a surprise.

I was showing the group I was with what twisting guardian and protective
rythms did for their resistance with a drum, and good god - every greater,
db and barbed skele on our side of unrest was making a beeline for ME!

We probably could have handled it had I known the reaction was gonna be
like that, and I sure as heck would have run quicker - thankfully, I am the
only one that died.

I was only affecting my group - these things came from out of NOWHERE - why
would this act like such a magnet?

Anyway - I think I'm gonna get a really good group together (one that can
handle that kind of heat) - and do it purposefully (a little less long) and
we won't need to debate on who the puller is anymore - looks like I'm
nominated as bait.
